description:
**Description**:</br>
Given a sorted array, remove the duplicates in place such that each element appears only once and return the new length. Do not allocate extra space for another array, you must do this by modifying the input array in place with O(1) extra memory.

**`Input:`**</br>
`An array of integers sorted in non-decreasing order.`

**`Output:`**</br>
`Return the modified array.`

**`Example:`**</br>
**`Input:`**</br>
`[1, 1, 2] `    
**`Output:`**

```
[1 2]

```

**`Explanation:`**</br>
`The function should modify the input array to be [1, 2] and return the new length 2.`

**`Constraint:`**</br>
•	`The input array is sorted.`</br>
•	`You must modify the array in-place; do not allocate extra space.`</br>
•	`You should return the modified array.`</br>
title: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array

code_skeletons.skeleton_define_class:
class Solution {
    public int removeDuplicates(List<Integer> nums) {
